meanings.definition: Reaching the highest point or level
meanings.sent1: The mountain climber reached the peakiest summit with great effort.
meanings.sent2: The tallest tree in the forest is also the peakiest.
meanings.sent3: The cat thought it was the peakiest of all the furniture climbers.
meanings.sent4: Her excitement reached the peakiest level when she won the competition.
meanings.sent5: The sun cast its peakiest rays over the horizon at dawn.

meanings.definition: Having the most pronounced or extreme characteristics
meanings.sent1: The spiciest chili in the dish had the peakiest flavor.
meanings.sent2: Among all the flowers, the red rose had the peakiest fragrance.
meanings.sent3: The comedian's jokes were the peakiest, making everyone burst into laughter.
meanings.sent4: His dedication to his work was at its peakiest during the busiest times.
meanings.sent5: The storm brought the peakiest winds we had ever experienced.
